doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons
New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons
No title. [Peace hath her victories no less renowned than war." The South (in the saddle again) "Yes you whipped us, but now we may whip you." [Southern industry at Birmingham, Alabama]
No title. [Peace hath her victories no less renowned than war." The South (in the saddle again) "Yes you whipped us, but now we may whip you." [Southern industry at Birmingham, Alabama]
Pen and ink drawing: Signed Th:Nast. The drawing was published with the above caption in Harper's Weekly, Aug. 22, 1885.
New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons
